results.title: Clinical outcome of statin plus ezetimibe versus high-intensity statin therapy in patients with acute myocardial infarction propensity-score matching analysis.
authors: other Korea Acute Myocardial Infarction Registry Investigators
results.text_hl: METHODS: A total of 3520 @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@AMI@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the KAMIR (Korea @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@Acute Myocardial Infarction@@@ Registry) were classified into @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ group (n=1249) and high-intensity statin group (n=2271).

citations.NLM: Ji MS, Jeong MH, Ahn YK, Kim SH, Kim YJ, Chae SC, Hong TJ, Seong IW, Chae JK, Kim CJ, Cho MC, Rha SW, Bae JH, Seung KB, Park SJ, other Korea Acute Myocardial Infarction Registry Investigators. Clinical outcome of statin plus ezetimibe versus high-intensity statin therapy in patients with acute myocardial infarction propensity-score matching analysis. Int J Cardiol. 2016 Dec 15;225():50-59. PMID: 27710803
citations.BibTeX: @article{27710803, title={Clinical outcome of statin plus ezetimibe versus high-intensity statin therapy in patients with acute myocardial infarction propensity-score matching analysis.}, author={Ji MS and Jeong MH and Ahn YK and Kim SH and Kim YJ and Chae SC and Hong TJ and Seong IW and Chae JK and Kim CJ and Cho MC and Rha SW and Bae JH and Seung KB and Park SJ and other Korea Acute Myocardial Infarction Registry Investigators}, journal={Int J Cardiol}, volume={225}, pages={50-59}}

results.title: Effect of Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Compared With Simvastatin Monotherapy After Acute Coronary Syndrome Among Patients 75 Years or Older: A Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: The rate of adverse events did not increase with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ vs @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-placebo among younger or older @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Bach RG, Cannon CP, Giugliano RP, White JA, Lokhnygina Y, Bohula EA, Califf RM, Braunwald E, Blazing MA. Effect of Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Compared With Simvastatin Monotherapy After Acute Coronary Syndrome Among Patients 75 Years or Older: A Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial. JAMA Cardiol. 2019 Sep 1;4(9):846-854. PMID: 31314050
citations.BibTeX: @article{31314050, title={Effect of Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Compared With Simvastatin Monotherapy After Acute Coronary Syndrome Among Patients 75 Years or Older: A Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial.}, author={Bach RG and Cannon CP and Giugliano RP and White JA and Lokhnygina Y and Bohula EA and Califf RM and Braunwald E and Blazing MA}, journal={JAMA Cardiol}, volume={4}, number={9}, pages={846-854}}
